data.message:
“It’s not important that only Kashmiri people will support or sign the petition.Anyone who supports basic human rights and values, the humanists from any part of the globe can support it, “We hope Obama will use his influence to prevail upon India to take steps for a peaceful resolution of Kashmir issue in accordance with wishes and aspirations of the people of Jammu and Kashmir.”

LINK 

http://www.petitiononline.com/mod_perl/signed.cgi?24102010&1901

THANKING YOU.....
